contentrichtext.text: '''GTOPO30''' is a [[digital elevation model]] for the world, developed by [[USGS]]. It has a 30-[[arc second]] resolution (approximately 1 km), <ref>http://eros.usgs.gov/#/Find_Data/Products_and_Data_Available/gtopo30_info</ref> and is split into 33 tiles stored in the [[USGS DEM]] [[file format]]. ==See also== * [[Shuttle Radar Topography Mission]] * [[Advanced Spaceborne Thermal Emission and Reflection Radiometer]] ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== * [http://eros.usgs.gov/#/Find_Data/Products_and_Data_Available/gtopo30_info GTOPO30 Page]. {{DEFAULTSORT:Gtopo30}} [[Category:Digital elevation models]] {{Cartography-stub}}
